::Epyon::

He glanced at a moniter on a wall, and got an idea.
"Wizard, change in plans. We're going to land this thing. Everyone back
to the bridge.
OOC: Prodigy should we land this thing in the water yet or no?

::Hot Rod::

There was no way he could get in after Unitron. He stayed near the exits
waiting for him to try and come out.

::DrillBit::

He held Dollen in his arms. 
"We have to pull back. If Dollen doesn't get some energy soon, he'll
die!"

::Demolition::

When Angel Prime put him in the brig he didn't take Demolition's
weapons.
"Vehical mode."
He transformed to plane mode and opened fire on the wall. He would soon
be out.
